instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1706: What is A1706? A1706 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years 2016, Mid 2017 with EMC 3071, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00239, 820-00923..

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Macbook not recognising touchbar after a fall.
threads.message:
Tested with spare touchbar, no light or touch response. 
Tried SMC reset. 

What else I can test?

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Macbook not recognising touchbar after a fall.
threads.message:
Probably broken trace/solder, or other mechanical damage on the MLB.

Inspect the connectors pins and check their voltage (touchbar connected).
